p: The models by Miao et al. [ 14] are designed to fit experimental in vivo data from mice [ 6, 7]. The first one ([ 14], Equation ( 1)) depends on measured time-series. The second one ([ 14], Equation ( 2)) is a simplified version of the first one, neglecting the terms depending on those time-series and still leading to a good fit within the first five days after infection [ 14]. Thus, we analyze this second model (Miao Model).
